title: 2 Bedroom Available Soon
posting_body: ['Twenty20 Mad has it all, only steps away from the hip eateries, galleries, premier shopping and prime work centers of Seattle.', 'Come see these brand-new, upscale Madison Valley apartments for yourself by scheduling an appointment today.', 'Exceptional Amenities', '• 24-Hour Music-Inspired Top-Floor Lounge with a Kitchen and Entertainment Room', '• 24-Hour Fitness Center, Including State-of-the-Art Cardio and Strength Equipment', '• 24-Hour Rooftop Terrace with Stunning Views and Year-Round Gas Grill', "• Across the Street from Safeway; Trader Joe's and Central Co-op Nearby", '• Easy Access to Public Transit to Downtown Seattle and Redmond', '• Adjacent to a New Public Park', '• Landscaped Courtyard', 'New Apartments near the heart of Capitol Hill:', '•', 'In-home full size washer/dryer', '• Wood vinyl hard-surface or concrete flooring throughout living areas', '• Upgraded kitchens/baths with contemporary cabinetry, quartz countertops, under-mount lighting, full backsplash and stainless-steel appliances', '• Walk in Closets*', '• Large Windows with Window Coverings', '• USB ports', '• Private Patios/ Balconies*', '• Spacious master-suites w/ large closets*', '• Energy efficiencies including dual-pane windows and digital thermostats', '• Breath taking views of Mt. Rainier, Cascade mountain range or Lake Washington*', 'Exceptional Amenities:', '• 24-hour fitness center including state of the art cardio and strength equipment', '• 24-hour Rooftop lounge with a BBQ grill, fire pit and views of Mt. Rainier, Cascade mountain range and Lake Washington', '• 24-hour 6th Floor lounge w/ kitchen, fireplace & a DJ mixing booth', '• Adjacent to a new public park', '• Landscaped courtyard', '• Across the street to Safeway', '• Easy access to public transit to Downtown and Redmond', '• 3 Grocery Stores within 3 Blocks', '*In select apartment homes', 'VIEW OUR WEBSITE:', '<URL>', 'Twenty20 Mad, managed by LMC', '2020 East Madison Street', 'Seattle, WA 98122', 'show contact info', 'Monday By Appointment Only', 'Tuesday', 'By Appointment', 'Only', 'Wednesday By Appointment Only', 'Thursday By Appointment Only', 'Friday By Appointment', 'Only', 'Saturday By Appointment Only', 'Apartment Features', '* Pre-wired for internet and cable', '* Electric Stove', '* Pantry', '* Refrigerator, Microwave, Dishwasher & Electric Stove', '* Private Patio or Private Balcony (on select apartments)', '* Window Coverings', '* Full sized Washer and Dryer in unit', '* Extra Storage', '* Disposal', '* Wood-Like Floors', '* Quartz Countertops', '* Kitchen Island', '* Linen Closet', '* Stainless Steel Appliances', '* Whirlpool Appliances']
